statements.name: FMTC2ITM
statements.description: Converts one or more format catalogs into a single item store.

arguments.name: CATALOG=
arguments.description: specifies a catalog that is to be converted to an item store. If you do not specify the CATALOG option, the default catalog is WORK.FORMATS.

arguments.name: ITEMSTORE=
arguments.description: specifies the name of the item store. You can specify a fileref, or you can specify a pathname in quotation marks.

arguments.name: ENCODING=
arguments.description: specifies an encoding for a catalog or for all of the catalogs in a list.

arguments.name: PRINT
arguments.description: displays information about each catalog member that is written.

arguments.name: LOCALE
arguments.description: adds locale-sensitive prefixes to the names of members of an item store.

statements.name: SELECT
statements.description: Lists the formats to place in the item store.

arguments.name: member-list
arguments.description: Contains the names of the formats to place in the item store.
